newsitem.title: UK: Rioting youths attack British police in Leeds.
newsitem.headline: Rioting youths attack British police in Leeds.

text.p: About 50 youths set cars on fire and attacked police with pickaxes and baseball bats in the northern English city of Leeds in the early hours of Saturday, police said.
Riot police were called in when the gang took to the streets of Leeds overnight.
Police said the riots appeared to be well planned and pre-meditated. Detectives believe the disturbances may be linked to drug arrests they made in the area earlier in the week.
Police said 20 cars were set ablaze by the youths who were dispersed by riot police after about an hour. There were no casualties.
